name: Galaxy Villains
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
The Project
Galaxy Villains is an upcoming project and community driven token under the Galaxy Heroes ecosystem.

 

This is not your regular Crypto Token. Here we build for the long-term and always based on utility development.

 

GVC is your gateway to a decentralized galaxy where holders can take leadership of their finances and earn sparkly rewards.

 

With focus on Blockchain, Web3, DeFi and GameFi development, Galaxy Villains intends to disrupt the crypto space and to get known by the masses while always shooting for moon!
